items.title: Supreme court allows Texas to use new congressional map favoring Republicans in 2026 elections – as it happened
items.summary: <p>This live blog is now closed.</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/dec/04/trump-administration-news-update-today">Trump news at a glance: US supreme court gives Texas win in national redistricting battle</a></p></li></ul><p><strong>Among the beneficiaries of <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/donaldtrump">Donald Trump</a>’s pardons and commutations, there is a group that legal experts and political scientists see as some of the clearest evidence of how such actions undermine the rule of law: those who were released from prison and again arrested for different alleged crimes</strong>.</p><p>During his first term, Trump issued 237 acts of clemency – including to someone who was a predatory lender and drug smuggler and to another who ran a Ponzi scheme. Since taking office again, Trump has issued more than 1,600, most for people involved in the <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/jan/20/trump-executive-orders-jan-6-pardons">January 6 attack</a> on Congress.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/dec/04/us-politics-live-donald-trump-latest-news-updates-democrats-republicans">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Pentagon announces it has killed four men in another boat strike in Pacific
items.summary: <p>Strike comes amid congressional turmoil over legality of US attacks on suspected drug smugglers</p><p>The Pentagon announced on Thursday that the US military had conducted another deadly strike on a boat suspected of carrying illegal narcotics, killing four men in the eastern Pacific, as questions mount over the legality of the attacks.</p><p>Video of the new strike was <a href="https://x.com/Southcom/status/1996726797086457886">posted on social media</a> by the US southern command, based in Florida, with a statement saying that, at the direction of <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/pete-hegseth">Pete Hegseth</a>, the defense secretary, “Joint Task Force Southern Spear conducted a lethal kinetic strike on a vessel in international waters operated by a Designated Terrorist Organization”.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/dec/04/pentagon-boat-strike-pacific">Continue reading...</a>
